definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Suggestions are made for perfecting the demurrage clause of the B/L.
sentences.chinese: 並對如何完善提單中的滯期費條款提出了簡單的設想。

sentences.english: The author also proposes a new concept: demurrage equality.
sentences.chinese: 同時，提出滯期費等式這一新概念。

sentences.english: What are the expected monthly demurrage costs?
sentences.chinese: 預期的月滯期費是多少？

sentences.english: After the first half of demurrage, they will have more and more significant impact.
sentences.chinese: 經過上半年的滯期費，他們將有越來越多的重大影響。
